title: Telemarketer/Appointment Setter
job_overview:
Job Description:
We are looking for a motivated Sales Representative to help us grow our client base and promote Upgrade to see actual info’s services globally. You'll be responsible for reaching out to potential clients, driving sales, and supporting our marketing campaigns.

Responsibilities:
* Reach out to potential clients via phone and email.
* Sell Upgrade to see actual info services to new and existing clients worldwide.
* Encourage participation in Upgrade to see actual info’s surveys on benefits and rewards.
* Identify new opportunities using sales tools.
* Plan and forecast sales for your assigned territory.
* Participate in weekly teaUpgrade to see actual infoetings and ongoing training.

Qualifications:
* Graduate of bachelor’s degree of any field (a must).
* At least 1 year of experience in the BPO industry (a must).
* Strong verbal and written communication skills.
* Able to work independently and with a team.
* Comfortable collaborating across departments.

Benefits:
* Work from Home – Flexible remote work.
* Paid Training – Full training provided.
* Weekends Off – Enjoy your weekends.
* Competitive Pay – Base salary plus bonuses and commissions.
